tool_description: 🟢 2023 LinkedIn Companies API [REAL TIME]: Retrieve the ideal JSON data from a LinkedIn Company in real-time.
name: Linkedin Company Database
title: Linkedin Company Database

api_list.name: Linkedin Company Info
api_list.description: API endpoint allows you to get data from LinkedIn Company Page.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: **PUBLIC LINKEDIN URL** of the target company (e.g `https://www.linkedin.com/company/microsoft`, `microsoft`). We do not yet support LinkedIn Company URLs with the ID like this: https://www.linkedin.com/company/1073820. This will be available in the next 2-3 months. (updated 15 septembre 2023)
